mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_FRANCHISE_T.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO FRANCHISE_T ( FRN_NO, FRN_NAME, FRN_OWNER, FRN_TEL, FRN_ZIP, FRN_STREET, FRN_DETAIL, FRN_IMG, FRN_JOIN_DT ) VALUES ( #{frnNo}, #{frnName}, #{frnOwner}, #{frnTel}, #{frnZip}, #{frnStreet}, #{frnDetail}, #{frnImg, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frnJoinDt} )
